item.title: Fried risers! Thoughts?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
â€¦

I donâ€™t know how to explain the fact that youâ€™re wrong, but you are in fact wrong. Iâ€™m going to try at the very leastâ€¦

A subscription (edited for clarification) to Splice would NOT permit the RESALE of sample packs. Auxyâ€™s subscription counts as a resale in legal terms. He would need a LICENSE for it. You donâ€™t BUY licenses from a subscription service like Splice. You either buy it from a middleman or directly from the company. This goes for many areas of business, and itâ€™s why places like Costco exist, and websites like CDW exist. They buy items in bulk then sell to end users at a reduced price, but still make a profit since they buy in bulk directly from manufacturers. But I digress, Iâ€™ve gotten off the point.

Since Lenberg would need a LICENSE to have ANY of the packs from places like BlackOctopus and Origin Sound, he gets them from the source (At least I can assume he does. I donâ€™t know of any third party music sampling bulk buyer out there).

I hope this makes senseâ€¦ if it doesnâ€™t I donâ€™t know how else I can help you aside from asking @Auxy himself to describe the process for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Fried risers! Thoughts?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
DJ_La_Rocca:

They buy packs from splice

Oh joy time to play the pronoun game! Thereâ€™s two interpretations, either Lenberg buys packs or Black Octopus buys packs. Iâ€™ve attached interpretations for both.

Lenberg buys them from Splice? No. I think youâ€™re misinformed. They are licensed from Black Octopus directly. Just like Splice licensed them from Black Octopus as well.

If youâ€™re saying Black Octopus bought them from Splice and sold them to Auxyâ€¦ well I donâ€™t really know how I can help explain this to you, but no. Thatâ€™s not whatâ€™s happening at all.

As I realize I forgot to say my thoughts on this pack, I can certainly say theyâ€™re a lot more useful than I first imagined, and am using them a fair bit.

Read full topic
